name: 𝕤𝕠𝕝𝕒𝕣𝕚𝕤
description:
𝕤𝕠𝕝𝕒𝕣𝕚𝕤 is based on the Sun, and the solar system as a whole. the animation represents two smaller objects orbiting a larger one, which is a minimal representation of the system.

this is part of my 𝐜𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐢𝐚𝐥 𝐯𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬 collection. it combines my love for space & astronomy, with an abstract monochrome art style. every artwork is a satisfying infinite loop of motion.
